ai-info-tooltip.description-disclaimer: Note! Content generated by artificial intelligence may contain errors.
ai-info-tooltip.description-opportunity-education-note: We have also utilized AI to identify competences for education opportunities.
ai-info-tooltip.description-opportunity-intro: We have used a language model to create the content on this page in the following parts:
ai-info-tooltip.description-summary: Read more: <CustomLink>About the use of AI<Icon></Icon></CustomLink>
ai-info-tooltip.description-tool-intro: We have used AI to create the content on this page in the following parts:
ai-info-tooltip.description-tool-item-3: individual suggestions for opportunities that suit you

competences-identify-failed: AI competence identification failed, please add competences by editing the education manually.

competence.description: This section compiles the user's competences from different sources: workplaces, education, leisure activities, and other competences. You can view competences in more detail by expanding the sections. At the end, there is the user's own free-form description related to competences.
competence.title: Competence

favorites.description: Job and education opportunities saved by the user, collected as favorites in one place.
favorites.title: My favorites

cv.ingress: The owner of the competence path profile has shared this link so you can view their information. The link is valid until {{date}}.

interests.description: This section compiles the user's interests: interesting competences and professions, as well as the user's own free-form description related to interests.
interests.title: Interests

cv.osaamispolku-description: Life changes – and we are here to support you. Whether you are changing fields, learning something new, or improving your everyday life, we provide you with easily understandable information and inspiration to support your own path.
cv.title: Competence profile

form.date-in-the-past: The date cannot be in the past

home.go-to-service-directory: Go to Guidance and counselling services
home.need-personal-guidance-content: Guidance and counselling services help you reflect on career and education options. Narrow down the list of services based on themes that interest you and, for example, your place of residence to find the services that suit you best.

no-match.description: The page you are looking for could not be found or the link is outdated. Please check the address, open the menu, or go to the homepage.
no-match.title: Oops! Page not found

competence.search-disclaimer: Text used for searching competences - it is not saved

interest.search-disclaimer: Text used for searching interests - it is not saved

share.delete-confirm-description: Are you sure you want to delete the share link?
share.description:
With a share link, you can share your information with people you choose. You decide what information you want to share with the link. The recipient does not need to log in to the Osaamispolku service.

Please note that anyone who receives the link can open it as long as the share link you created is valid. Only share the link with trusted parties or individuals whom you want to be able to view your shared information. You can delete the link you created at any time. After deletion, your information can no longer be viewed via the link.

basic-info.description: Optionally give the link a name (alias) and set its validity period. You can also add a note about who the link is intended for. The information to be shared is selected in the next step.
basic-info.name: Name
basic-info.title: Basic information

data-to-share.description: Select what information you want to share. Basic information is always included. You can also choose to share your workplaces, education, favorites, and plans.

modal.description-placeholder: E.g. who the link is for
modal.name: Link name

share.title: Share your competence profile

competences.info: You can choose which information from your Competence Profile you want to use in exploring opportunities by importing it to the Find Opportunities page.

competency-profile.help: Import competences from your competence profile to your overall data view. You can utilize previously saved competences when exploring opportunities. You can import all competences or only those you want.

tool.education-opportunity-duration-tooltip: The duration of the education opportunity indicates how long the education typically lasts. It is usually expressed in years or months and is based on the scope of the education and the normal pace of studies.
tool.education-opportunity-koulutusala-toolti: The field of education refers to the group into which educational programs are categorized based on the scientific, societal, or professional domain they relate to.

info.logged-in: The information from your competence profile does not transfer directly to this page. You can import it from the Competence Profile section. Try different combinations and update your opportunities.
info.logged-out: You can edit your selections in the Summary of Your Information section. Try different combinations and update your opportunities.

info-overview.other-data-from-profile-description: Your text additions to other competences and interests

import.confirm-description: Import competences from your competence profile to your overall data view. Select the competences you want from the list below.
import.success-toast: Data imported successfully to the overall view

export.confirm-description: Select the data you want to export to your competence profile. You will find it later in the competence profile under 'Other Competences' and 'My Interests'.
